Description: Part of Google Workspace, Gmail offers seamless integration with Google Calendar, Docs, and Drive, making it ideal for teams needing collaboration and cloud storage.
A privacy-first email provider with end-to-end encryption, ProtonMail is built for organizations needing secure communication and GDPR-compliant infrastructure.
An affordable email service designed for startups and small businesses, offering custom domains, basic calendar, and admin controls at minimal cost.
Outlook is part of Microsoft 365, offering deep integration with Word, Excel, Teams, and robust calendaring for enterprise-grade collaboration.
